class ke2450 (ke2450)
    method Initialize
    method Close
    method GetChannel
    method CheckError

    property Initialized
    property drivername

    property (subclass) DriverOperation (IIviDriverOperation)
    property (subclass) Identity (IIviDriverIdentity)

    property (subclass) Trigger (ke2450_Trigger)
        method Initiate
        method Abort
        method Wait4Idle
        method ConfigureSimpleLoopTrigger
        method ConfigureDurationLoopTrigger
        method ConfigureConfigListTrigger
        method ResetTriggerModel

    property (subclass) DirectIO (ke2450_DirectIO)
        method Write
        method Read
        method Query

    property (subclass) System (ke2450_System)
        method SetCurrentTime
        method SelectFrontTerminal
        method SelectRearTerminal
        method Beep
        method ClearEventLog
        method BufferCreate
        method BufferClear
        method BufferDelete
        method BufferModify
        method BufferGetActualSize
        method DisplayMessage
        method DisplayMessageClear
        method DisplayScreen

        property (subclass) Utility (IIviDriverUtility)

    property (subclass) DevUtils (ke2450_DevUtils)
        property Enums
        property vi
        property dllwrap
        property visa_mbr  (the message based pyvisa resource)

        property (subclass) DriverOperation (IIviDriverOperation)
        property (subclass) LowLevel (ke2450_LowLevel)  (contains all function of the dll wrapped in a class)


class Channel (ke2450_Channel)
    method SourceMeterSetup
    method ResetOutputProtection

    property (subclass) Source (ke2450_Source)
        method SetOutputEnabled
        method SetVoltageProtectionLevel

        property (subclass) Voltage(ke2450_Source_V, inherits ke2450_Source_X)
            method SetCurrentLimit
            method ConfigureSource (inherited)
            method ConfigureLinearSweep (inherited)
            method ConfigureLogarithmicSweep (inherited)
            method ConfigureLinearSweepStep (inherited)
            method ConfigureListSweep (inherited)

        property (subclass) Current (ke2450_Source_I, inherits ke2450_Source_X)
            method SetVoltageLimit
            method ConfigureSource (inherited)
            method ConfigureLinearSweep (inherited)
            method ConfigureLogarithmicSweep (inherited)
            method ConfigureLinearSweepStep (inherited)
            method ConfigureListSweep (inherited)

        property (subclass) ConfigLists (ke2450_Source_ConfigLists)
            method Create
            method Delete
            method DeleteIndex
            method GetSize
            method Store
            method StoreIndex
            method RecallIndex


    property (subclass) Measure (ke2450_Measure)
        method AutoZeroOnce
        method ConfigureMeasurementCount
        method Fetch
        method Read

        property (subclass) Voltage (ke2450_Measure_V, inherits ke2450_Measure_X)
            method ConfigureVoltageMeasureUnits
            method ConfigureMeasurement (inherited)
            method ConfigureAutoRange (inherited)
            method ConfigureAveragingFilter (inherited)
            method ConfigureRelativeOffset (inherited)
            method Acquire (inherited)

        property (subclass) Current (ke2450_Measure_C, inherits ke2450_Measure_X)
            method ConfigureCurrentMeasureUnits
            method ConfigureMeasurement (inherited)
            method ConfigureAutoRange (inherited)
            method ConfigureAveragingFilter (inherited)
            method ConfigureRelativeOffset (inherited)
            method Acquire (inherited)

        property (subclass) ConfigLists (ke2450_Measure_ConfigLists)
            method Create
            method Delete
            method DeleteIndex
            method GetSize
            method Store
            method StoreIndex
            method RecallIndex

        property (subclass) Trace (ke2450_Trace)
            method GetAverageReading
            method GetMaximumReading
            method GetMinimumReading
            method GetPeak2PeakReading
            method GetSDevReading
            method GetData
            method GetReadingWaveform
            method GetSourceWaveform
